pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants, Shoes plus socks, Chemical-resistant gloves: barrier laminate, butyl rubber >14 mils, neoprene rubber >14 mils, nitrile rubber >14 mils, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) >14 mils, or Viton® >14 mils

Safety_Information.general_Info: CAUTION. Harmful if swallowed, inhaled or absorbed through the skin. Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes, skin or clothing.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continuing rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably mouth-to-mouth if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling poison control center (888-347-6732) or doctor, or going for treatment. For 24-Hour Emergency Assistance, chemical spill, leak, fire, exposure, or accident call CHEMTREC 1-800-424-9300.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.266 lbs thiamethoxam ai; 12.3 lbs mefenoxam ai per acre per year
